tip.unselectedElementTip: Please click or select the content of the drawing board
tip.cameraPermissionDenied: Camera permission denied, please check the browser permission

boardConfig.cacheTip: In the presence of a large amount of drawing content, enabling caching will improve drawing performance, while disabling caching will improve canvas sharpness

request.error: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

uploadImage.removeBackgroundGpuTip: WebGPU is not supported in this browser, to use the remove background function, please use the latest version of Google Chrome
uploadImage.removeBackgroundFailed: Remove background function failed to load
uploadImage.imageSegmentationFailed: Image Segmentation function failed to load
uploadImage.imageSegmentationProcessed: The image has been processed successfully, you can click on the image to mark it, the green mask area is the segmentation area.
uploadImage.imageSegmentationGpuTip: WebGPU is not supported in this browser, to use the image segmentation function, please use the latest version of Google Chrome.

eraserConfig.erasableTip: After enabling, the eraser can erase all content

lockConfig.lockTip: After enabling, the object will not be able to move, rotate or scale

graphInput.titleTip: Graphics from Lucide, click to view more graphics
graphInput.addFailed: Not found, please check the name

camera.openTip: Click the bottom left corner to open the camera

shadow.configTip: Color, Blur, X Offset, Y Offset

features.freeDrawingDesc1: Provides 12 different styles of brushes: basic brush, rainbow brush, multi-shape brush, material brush, pixel brush, multi-color brush, text brush, multi-line connection brush, mesh brush, multi-point connection brush, wave curve brush, thorn brush. Meet diverse drawing needs
features.freeDrawingDesc2: All brushes support customization of color and brush width
features.freeDrawingDesc3: Multi-shape brush supports flexible configuration of shape type and quantity
features.freeDrawingDesc4: Material brush and multi-color brush can customize material types
features.freeDrawingDesc5: Text brush supports loop text and font configuration
features.shapeDrawingDesc1: Supports drawing rich graphics, including built-in graphics and Lucide icon library graphics, just click to add and use
features.shapeDrawingDesc2: Configurable line width, line style, fill color and fill style
features.eraserModeDesc1: Supports linear erasing of any drawn content
features.selectModeDesc1: Supports clicking or box selecting content for editing
features.selectModeDesc2: After selection, you can drag, scale, and rotate through handles
features.selectModeDesc3: Each element supports the following settings
features.selectModeDesc3_1: Layer management: move up, move down, bring to front, send to back
features.selectModeDesc3_2: Eraser switch: when enabled, eraser can erase current element
features.selectModeDesc3_3: Lock switch: when enabled, current object cannot move, rotate or scale
features.selectModeDesc4: Image elements support multiple filter effects
features.selectModeDesc5: Text elements support font, bold, italic and other style adjustments
features.boardModeDesc1: Board background settings, supports color, background image, camera multiple backgrounds, supports simultaneous display, draggable display hierarchy
features.boardModeDesc1_1: Background color: supports solid color, gradient, transparency configuration
features.boardModeDesc1_2: Background image: supports transparency and background removal and image segmentation configuration when uploading images
features.boardModeDesc1_3: Camera: supports real-time shooting and freeze current frame as background, adjustable filter, brightness, contrast, saturation and transparency
features.boardModeDesc2: Board size supports custom width and height
features.boardModeDesc3: Drawing cache: In the presence of a large amount of drawing content, enabling cache will improve drawing performance, while disabling cache will improve canvas sharpness
features.boardModeDesc4: Guide lines: when enabled, convenient for multi-element dragging alignment
features.bottomLeftDesc1: Help button: click to open help popup, supports language switching and viewing shortcuts and feature descriptions
features.bottomLeftDesc2: Circular progress bar: real-time display of current zoom ratio, click to reset zoom ratio
features.bottomLeftDesc3: Camera button: displays current camera status, supports multiple display configurations
features.bottomOperationDesc1: Functions from left to right are: undo, redo, copy current selection, delete current selection, draw text, upload image, clear drawing content, save as image, open file list
features.bottomOperationDesc1_1: Upload image supports background removal, image segmentation. This function requires browser support for WebGPU, recommend using the latest version of Google Chrome
features.bottomOperationDesc1_2: Save as image supports custom configuration. Rotate, scale, crop
features.fileListDesc: Supports multiple canvas switching, each canvas can customize title, add, delete, and provides upload and download functions
features.internationalizationDesc: Supports Chinese (Simplified), Chinese (Traditional), English, Japanese, Korean

toolOperations.switchFreeDrawing: Switch to Free Drawing in Draw Mode
toolOperations.switchShapeDrawing: Switch to Shape Drawing in Draw Mode
toolOperations.switchBrushType: Switch Brush Type in Free Drawing
